| price = Free

}}[[File:3rd Birthday SP.jpg|thumb|Key art]]

'''3rd Birthday Skin Pack'''<ref>{{Cite|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150507205123/https://mojang.com/2015/05/happy-birthday-minecraft-xbox-360-edition/|title=Happy Birthday Minecraft: Xbox 360 Edition!|date=May 7, 2015|author=Owen|website=Mojang.com}}</ref> (released as the '''1st Birthday Skin Pack''' on {{editions|wiiu|switch}}<ref name="nintendo1">{{Tweet|4JStudios|811865860855963648|Happy 1st Birthday Minecraft: Wii U Edition! The free 1st Birthday Skin Pack is now available for Wii U :)}}</ref><ref name="nintendo2">{{Tweet|4JStudios|943043476815429632|Happy 2nd Birthday Minecraft: Nintendo Editions!<br>The free 2nd Birthday Skin Pack (and 1st Birthday Skin Pack) will be available later today/early tomorrow for Nintendo Switch & Nintendo Wii U!}}</ref>) is a [[skin pack]] that includes 19 skins, 16 of which being skins of ''Minecraft'' developers, celebrating the third anniversary of ''[[Xbox 360 Edition]]'s'' release.

It was available on {{editions|xbox 360|xbox one}} from May 7 to May 17, 2015, May 9 to May 16, 2016,<ref>{{Cite|url=https://news.xbox.com/en-us/2016/05/09/minecraft-fourth-birthday-skin-pack-xbox-editions/|title=It’s the big 4.0 – Happy Birthday Minecraft: Xbox Edition!|date=May 9, 2016|website=Xbox Wire}}</ref> and May 9 to May 21, 2017.<ref>{{Tweet|4JStudios|861881805720481792|The FREE 1st, 2nd, 3rd & 4th Birthday Skin Packs are also available now for Xbox 360 and Xbox One. Get them while you can!}}</ref>

From December 21, 2016 and from December 19, 2017 on, the skin pack was available on {{editions|ps3|ps4|psvita}} for a limited time.<ref>{{Tweet|4JStudios|811525175984422913|Happy 3rd Birthday Minecraft: PlayStation Editions! The free 3rd Birthday Skin Pack is available now for Sony consoles!}}</ref><ref>{{Tweet|4JStudios|943043232807632899|Happy 4th Birthday Minecraft: PlayStation Editions! The free 4th Birthday Skin Pack (and the 1st, 2nd & 3rd Birthday Skin Packs) will be available today for Sony consoles!}}</ref> Starting from December 22, 2016, this skin pack was available on {{edition|wii u}} for a limited time.<ref name="nintendo1"/> Beginning December 19, 2017, the skin pack was released again on {{editions|wii u|switch}} for a limited time.<ref name="nintendo2"/>

Due to the [[Better Together Update]], it was added {{in|be}} on September 12, 2017, although it is only available to players who owned it already when they migrated from Legacy Console Edition.<ref>{{Mcnet|new-marketplace-space-sports-and-dinosaurs|New on Marketplace: Space, Sports and Dinosaurs|September 21, 2017|Tom Stone}}</ref>

This skin pack is available to claim on [https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/kolya/9P2B70RFXN5R?purchaseSignIn=true Xbox.com]
